EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_NextGenDataLake_Session2_Q114.Cancelation 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Session Cancelation Notice: Pivotal's Next Generation Data Lake Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are sorry to inform you that our next webinar – Introduction to Pivotal's Next Generation Data Lake – on Thursday, March 27/Friday, March 28, 2014 at 6PM PDT/9AM GMT+8 has been canceled.
We invite you to join us for our earlier session <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/webinar/introduction-to-pivotals-next-generation-analytic-data-lake> at 9:00AM PDT. If you are unable to make this session, you will have exclusive access to an early release of the replay when it becomes available. Interested in other installments in this series? Check out these on-demand recordings of our monthly "What You Can Do With Hadoop" webcasts:
- Exploring Pivotal HD Single Node <http://www.gopivotal.com/resources#http://bitcast-a.v1.o1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/pivotalvideo/Webinar-08062013-PHD.m4v> - Unstructured Data - Video Analytics on Hadoop <http://www.gopivotal.com/resources#http://bitcast-a.v1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/pivotalvideo/Unstructured_Data_Video_Analytics_on_Hadoop_Session_1.m4v> - Building Big Data Application with Hadoop and Spring <http://www.gopivotal.com/resources#http://bitcast-a.v1.o1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/pivotalvideo/Building-Big-Data-Applications-with-Hadoop-Spring-WEB.m4v> - Business Data Lake: An Evolution in Data Infrastructure <http://www.gopivotal.com/resources#http://bitcast-a.v1.o1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/pivotalvideo/The_Business_Data_Lake_an_evolution_in_Data_Infrastructure.m4v>
We look forward to bringing you more opportunities to learn about Pivotal products and solutions in the future and hope you’ll join us next time!
The Pivotal Team
